name: its a game 123
description:
Oh no! it looks like you are stuck in a windows computer. you beter shoot the things and avoide that one weird  pokemon. I also updated again this game on 8/3/18 so yay

. once you get to 120 points you win yay

. scary monster maze is also a good game too
